name: Just a Cute Little Baby
description:
You are stuck on an island with the baby, which haunts you during the night. You want to escape this island but the only way to cross is the moving bridge. Solve the puzzles to stop bridge from moving and survive the night.

Average playtime - 15-20 minz

KEY FEATURES:
  • Ambient environment
  • Volumetric fog
  • Short horror puzzle experience
  • 15-20 minz gameplay
CONTROLS:
  • W/A/S/D- Walk
  • E - Equipe Item
  • Q - Drop Item
  • Scroll - Switch Items
  • Shift - Sprint
STEPS:
  • Unzip the file
  • Play JustAlittleBaby.exe
LINKS:
